original: 汝南細陽人，東吳重要將領。從孫策平江東，孫策死後，繼續扶持孫權。無論做為統兵將領，或是出鎮一方，都頗有建樹。演義中指其在赤壁戰中偏向投降，和史實不符。
text: Runan Xiyang, an important general of Soochow. From Sun Ceping Jiangdong, after Sun Ce died, he continued to support Sun Quan. Whether as a general or as a party out of town, he has made a lot of achievements. In the novel, it is said that he was inclined to surrender in the battle of Chibi, which is inconsistent with historical facts.
